meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Stekelberg Sally Greene David Menchaca Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6400.

td.p: Jim Stekelberg, a Ph.D. student in accounting from Granada Hills, California
Sally Greene, an education instructor from Moscow, Idaho
David Menchaca, a law student originally from Long Beach, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,900)

tr.td: THE BRITISH ARE COMING!
3-LETTER WORDS
INVENTORS
.gov
WHO SAID WHAT ABOUT WHOM?
"G"EOGRAPHY

(Sasrah of the Clue Crew reports from Panama)
Covering nearly 170 square miles, this man-made lake acts as water storage, enabling the Panama Canal to continue operation through the dry season.
